duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage multiple demand response and/or energy efficiency programs across the southwest.
Provide project planning and management of energy efficiency and/or demand response programs.
Recruit, manage, and provide installation support for field technicians.
Assist sales and engineering team in the development of energy audits, M&V plans, and cost estimating.
Review bid/contract packages for quality assurance and interface with local contractor teams.
Make recommendations to Local Service/Sales teams for improved customer support and assist with contract retention strategies and tools for recapturing canceled customers.
Monitor and update performance tracking reports and project deviations.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 3 years' experience in managing energy efficiency and/or demand response programs for a utility or business.
